name: We Don't Need Polygons
description:
This is my submission game for the BlackThornProd's Game Jam #3 with the theme: Less is More.

In this game, you are a commander of the circle kingdom trying to prevent the polygons from invading. Survive for 20 waves with 3 different maps with turrets. But remember, the less turrets you deployed, the more effective they are.

This is a tower defense real time strategy game that is not your typical tower defense game. Good luck and have fun!
